info.author: OpenStack
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Apache Software License
License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License v2 (GPLv2)
info.description:
About
-----

Dstat is a versatile replacement for vmstat, iostat, mpstat, netstat and
ifstat. Dstat overcomes some of their limitations and adds some extra
features, more counters and flexibility. Dstat is handy for monitoring
systems during performance tuning tests, benchmarks or troubleshooting.

This is a fork of dstat's plugins intended to maintain full compatibility
version 1.7 of dstat, and any future released versions.

Licensing
---------

Dstat and its plugins are licensed under the GNU GPL v2. As such,
new plugins written here will be licensed that way to allow simpler
distribution with dstat.  You can find a copy of the GPLv2 in COPYING.

The testing code in this repository, however, is licensed under the
Apache 2.0 license. This code can be found under the filename LICENSE.
info.name: dstat-plugins
info.summary: dstat plugins for metering an OpenStack deployment
info.html_description:
About

Dstat is a versatile replacement for vmstat, iostat, mpstat, netstat and ifstat. Dstat overcomes some of their limitations and adds some extra features, more counters and flexibility. Dstat is handy for monitoring systems during performance tuning tests, benchmarks or troubleshooting.

This is a fork of dstat’s plugins intended to maintain full compatibility version 1.7 of dstat, and any future released versions.

Licensing

Dstat and its plugins are licensed under the GNU GPL v2. As such, new plugins written here will be licensed that way to allow simpler distribution with dstat. You can find a copy of the GPLv2 in COPYING.

The testing code in this repository, however, is licensed under the Apache 2.0 license. This code can be found under the filename LICENSE.
